resources.string: Get more into my world by visiting my website for incredible projects. Don\'t forget to rate it as your feedback really matters. Thank You!!!

Wordle is a word-guessing game. The objective of the game is to guess a 5-letter word in 6 tries. In the original version, you can play only 1 wordle a day which is available on NY Times. But, on our application, you will be able to play as many Wordles as you want!
Each guess must be a valid five-letter word. Hit the enter button to submit.
After each guess, the color of the tiles will change to show how close your guess was to the word.
Examples:
